add: We will now add item #{element.key}:#{element.value} with hash #{hash}
newHash: This is the first occurence of the hash #{hash}; creating list head
willInsertItem: The list for hash #{hash} exists. We'll now insert the item based on the selected list implementation.
unordered-append: The list is an unordered list, so we just append the item.
ordered-prepend: The new item has the lowest sort order (#{element.key}), so we'll prepend it to the list.
ordered-append: The new item has the highest sort order (#{element.key}), so we'll append it to the list.
ordered-insert: The new item will be inserted at position #{result+1}.
